node.category: What is the way things are?
Should rent prices be more heavily controlled?

node.surface: A stop must be put to exorbitant rents

node.category: How can high rent prices be stopped?

node.surface: by imposing a limit on rent increases when changing residences.

node.category: Why does increased rent need to be limited?

node.surface: For affordable living space is scarce.
Besides, a higher degree of luxury (expensive flats) is not necessary for the majority of the people,

node.category: What is necessary for the majority of people?

node.surface: but rather a flat at all.

node.category: How often do people change residences?

node.surface: Plus everyone has to move approx. 3-10 times in his or her life,

node.category: Why do people move so often in their lifetimes?

node.surface: because the size of the desired accommodation changes over the course of a lifetime.
